document_data.name: Calantar's Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Calantar's Way''' ({{Pronounce|CAH|lan|tare|refs=}}) was a long road running north to south in the nation of [[Cormyr]]. The southernmost point of Calantar's Way was the city of [[Suzail]].
document_data.Geography: Calantar's Way crossed the [[Starwater River]] at [[Calantar's Bridge]], just south of the town of [[Hilp]].
document_data.Description: Calantar's Way had been well-cared-for over the years by those who used it.
document_data.History: Calantar's Way was surveyed and built by the [[Calantar]] noble family in the late 900s [[DR]] as a cart road.
